definitions.definition: The body of a dead animal , especially a vertebrate or other animal having flesh .
The body of a slaughtered animal, stripped of unwanted viscera , etc.
The body of a dead human , a corpse .
The body of a live person.
The framework of a structure , especially one not normally seen.
An early incendiary ship-to-ship projectile consisting of an iron shell filled with saltpetre , sulphur , resin , turpentine , antimony and tallow with vents for flame .

main_definition: The body of a dead animal , especially a vertebrate or other animal having flesh .
secondary_definitions: ( meat trade ) The body of a slaughtered animal, stripped of unwanted viscera , etc.
The body of a dead human , a corpse .
( slang ) The body of a live person.
The framework of a structure , especially one not normally seen.
( nautical ) An early incendiary ship-to-ship projectile consisting of an iron shell filled with saltpetre , sulphur , resin , turpentine , antimony and tallow with vents for flame .
